item.title: Book Your Appointment with COMM+D Online!
item.description: Are you working on a writing assignment, oral presentation, or visual design project? Whether you’re at the beginning brainstorming stages or finishing up your final revisions, the Center for Global Communication+Design (Comm+D) can help, so be sure to schedule an appointment with a member of the Center’s trained staff!

item.title: EMPAC’s First Dance Festival is this week | April 17 - 18
item.description: April 17-18, 2025 — Join us for EMPAC’s inaugural dance festival EPHEMERAL ORGAN, where movement becomes memory. Over two evenings, the artists will transform EMPAC’s spaces into living archives—chambers where dance, installation, and conversation unfold. RPI Community tickets: $5

item.title: IEEE EPS Mini Colloquium on Semiconductor Technology Evolution | April 18 (Registration Required)
item.description: Date: Friday, April 18, 2025 8:00 AM - 1:30 PM - The IEEE EDS/EPS MHV and RPI Chapters are excited to announce the upcoming 2nd Mini-Colloquium (MQ) 2025 on Semiconductor Technology Evolution, which will take place at CBIS Auditorium, RPI campus, on April 18th, 2025. The event is open to ALL! Registration is required. Register here: https://events.vtools.ieee.org/m/476707

item.title: TIAA Confidential Counseling (In-Person) | April 23
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, April 23, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits. Consultations will be conducted in 60 minute increments. To schedule your individual retirement counseling, please call TIAA at 1-800-732-8353 or online at https://shared.tiaa.org/public/publictools/events…
